product_name: The North Face  Sun Rise T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring a soothing print with eye-catching colors, The North Face Sun Rise T-Shirt for women is crafted of semi-sheer burnout fabric for breathable coverage and an incredibly soft touch.
short_description: Featuring a soothing print with eye-catching colors, The North Face Sun Rise T-Shirt for women is crafted of semi-sheer burnout fabric for breathable coverage and an incredibly soft touch.
